formElement.label: Output Property:
formElement.documentation: The property sheet or property that results will be returned into.

formElement.label: Location Type:
formElement.documentation: Location to list from: (to list from a Journal use ListFromJournal, to list from a Reposititory use ListFromRepository instead)

formElement.label: Resource Name:
formElement.documentation: (Optional) resource object criteria for a resource definition embedded in a BAImage: resource name

formElement.label: Resource Group:
formElement.documentation: (Optional) resource object criteria for a resource definition embedded in a BAImage: resource group

formElement.label: Resource Type:
formElement.documentation: (Optional) resource object criteria for a resource definition embedded in a BAImage: resource type

formElement.label: Resource Instance:
formElement.documentation: Resource object criteria to append: resource instance (optional, valid only for use with the Recover procedure)

formElement.label: Serialized Resource Object Criteria:
formElement.documentation: Additional objects(s) to recover: XML serialized list of sets of resource object criteria, one per additional object, created using the procedure SerializeOtherObjectCriteria (optional, the object specified above is appended to this).

formElement.label: Recover Image:
formElement.documentation: Specify whether to recover the before image (undo the change) or the after image (redo the change).

formElement.label: Rollback Option:
formElement.documentation: The rollback option applies only when recovering before images. The rollback option protects you from unintentionally overwriting changes that are outside of the set you have selected. Specifically, the rollback option ensures that the selected changes for a resource definition form an unbroken chain that begins at the current resource definition and ends at the before image of the oldest selected change.
